name: Pocket Pursuit
summary:
In Pocket Pursuit you take on the role of either police cruisers working together to catch a criminal car in a high speed chase through a living city, or as the getaway car of a dangerous criminal. Try not to get wrecked and get the highest score possible. 
 
Avoid traffic cars, collect coins to upgrade your vehicles with custom rims and paint - or unlock new vehicles to create mayhem with! Be the driver behind the wheel of a vehicle in a high speed pursuit today, but try to avoid getting your car busted in an accident. Will the criminals escape, or will the police prevail and save the city from crime? That is up to you.
